turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm really frustrated because my package hasn't arrived yet. The tracking number is 987654321. It was supposed to be delivered two days ago!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I understand that can be frustrating. Thank you for providing the tracking number. Let me look that up for you. One moment please. Okay, I see the tracking for 987654321 indicates it is currently processed at a sorting facility. We apologize for the delay.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: "Processed at a sorting facility"? That's what it's said for three days! That's not helpful at all. Why hasn't it moved? Can you tell me *which* sorting facility? And what specifically is being done to get it moving *today*?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I sincerely apologize that the previous update wasn't more specific. While I can't provide the exact real-time location or facility name through this chat interface, I can see there may have been an unexpected delay at that processing step. To get a more concrete action taken, I have initiated a formal service request for your package. This flags it for review at the facility. You should receive an email with an updated estimated delivery window within 1-2 business days.
